ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Previously an R wrapper of the 'ARPACK' library <http://www.caam.rice.edu/software/ARPACK/>, and now a shell of the R package 'RSpectra', an R interface to the 'Spectra' library <http://yixuan.cos.name/spectra/> for solving large scale eigenvalue/vector problems. The current version of 'rARPACK' simply imports and exports the functions provided by 'RSpectra'. New users of 'rARPACK' are advised to switch to the 'RSpectra' package.

Previously an R wrapper of the 'ARPACK' library <http://www.caam.rice.edu/software/ARPACK/>, and now a shell of the R package 'RSpectra', an R interface to the 'Spectra' library <http://yixuan.cos.name/spectra/> for solving large scale eigenvalue/vector problems. The current version of 'rARPACK' simply imports and exports the functions provided by 'RSpectra'. New users of 'rARPACK' are advised to switch to the 'RSpectra' package.

name: r-rarpack
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.11-0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rarpack
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rARPACK_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rARPACK/rARPACK_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c33401e2e31d272d485ce2ed22e7fe43ac641fd7c0a45a9b848d3ad60df1028a

build:
  number: 1007
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - r-rspectra
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rspectra

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rARPACK')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rARPACK')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/yixuan/rARPACK
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  summary: Previously an R wrapper of the 'ARPACK' library <http://www.caam.rice.edu/software/ARPACK/>, and now a shell of the R package 'RSpectra', an R interface to the 'Spectra' library <http://yixuan.cos.name/spectra/> for solving large scale eigenvalue/vector problems. The current version of 'rARPACK' simply imports
    and exports the functions provided by 'RSpectra'. New users of 'rARPACK' are advised to switch to the 'RSpectra' package.
  license_family: BSD
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/BSD_3_clause
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
